channel.title: Chosen Pkz Delta Base | Battlescape Combat | Vote for Release!
channel.description:
Hey guys, i thought i would show a little of my project i have been working on. Yes, the source is a Deltascape Base.. but the added combat system makes up 100%.
RELEASED ! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437590.0.html RELEASED ! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437590.0.html RELEASED ! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437590.0.html
This started out as a regular Deltascape Base & Client. I've been working on this for quit some time now and when i am finished i will be releasing to Moparscape, depending on the feedback. If you guys don't like then i won't release.
So definitely let me know what you guys think of it!
I'll start of with the highly edited Combat System!
[b]Combat System[/b] -Perfect Spell Delays -Instant Special attacks -Battlescape Combat -Special attacks don't reflect fake damage to yourself. -Npc Defense -Npc's freeze you, and you freeze them aswell. -Multi-Barrage spells. (Multi zones only). -Certain Npc's such as Apetoll Monkeys, heal themselfs. -50% if Npc's are animated. (General Graador is).
[i]The combat for this server is truly what stands out, i love any server with a good combat system! There truly is a lot of great features, i just don't have the time to explain them all.[/i]
[b]Emote System[/b] -525 walk, run, stand, block, punch, kick animations. -Godsword special attacks, stances, new anims. -Dragon claws, 525 special attack (4x). -Crossbow special attacks, Karil bow aswell. -Defender Block. -562 Whip attack, can toggle on or off, with custom interface. -Barrelchest anchor, special, walk, run, block, stand. -New Dance emote -Vengeance & Vengeance Other -New runescape teleports, and runescape tele tabs. -Working rest emote, just doesn't recharge run.
[i]The emote system is truly something special for a Deltascape server, as you can see i have spent a good amount of time on emotes. I think a good emote system is what really makes a server stand out. [/i] [b]Minigames[/b] -Duel Arena 99% Just haven't added arrow over opponent head, or special restore after duel. (Staking, toggle duel settings work). -Barrows, 75% (Still working on loading tunnel maps, and working correct Chest). -Pest Control 100% Added PC Interface, and Npc's in PC game. -Assault, just the average Deltascape one, haven't worked on that. -Warriors Guild 75%, Only thing left to do is, make correct Npc's drop correct tokens for armour type. (Npc's load up). -Godwars, 100%, eventually wan't to load the real GWD maps. -Soulwars, 25%, I have 2 Main bosses, that slayer levels lower, when loading bones into a hopper.
[i]Minigames, i feel they make a huge impact on servers. Especially a stable non buggy game.[/i]
[b]Pictures[/b] Well i think i typed enough, i show you guys a few photos.
Client [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25ktutc.jpg[/img] Login Box [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ja9xf6.jpg[/img] Punch [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ljssoy.jpg[/img] Reting emote [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ynh2lz.jpg[/img] Fully animated Dungeoneering Cape! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rubapy.jpg[/img] New whip attack animation [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6r096r.jpg[/img] Npc No clipping fixed, Ancients freeze Npc's [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/rj4f1f.jpg[/img] Vengeance & Vengeance Other [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/30bgpvn.jpg[/img] Fog [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/111tk7p.jpg[/img] New range animation [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2jry46.jpg[/img] Perfect Player vs Npc Combat (Perfect Claws) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/v64x9u.jpg[/img] Dragon Claw Run [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ne8aa1.jpg[/img] Dragon Claw Special [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/egxuv9.jpg[/img] Armadyl Godsword [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/27wr42p.jpg[/img] Bandos Godsword [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/16c6edk.jpg[/img] Zammorak Godsword [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/28kn3pu.jpg[/img] Saradomin Godsword [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/212czea.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Reply Yes or No for release![/b][/size]

item.title: Chosen Pkz Delta Base | Battlescape Combat | Vote for Release!
item.dc:creator: @King_Zuber King_Zuber
item.description:
@King_Zuber wrote:

cows1471:

Why battlescape combat. Why not rewrite it

Whats the point in rewriting it, it makes no sence starting from scratch because the combats already good and I don’t see any reason to rewrite it. It’s only necessary to rewrite it if you made your own framework and such, but judging from this topic it’s like a Delta and BattleScape fusion.

Read full topic

item.title: Chosen Pkz Delta Base | Battlescape Combat | Vote for Release!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Chosen Pkz, post:22, topic:340109”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=436487.msg3211510#msg3211510 date=1274297507]
Looks good except for all the 508 shit
[/quote]

People don’t understand that players like that. A majority of the people like 317 because the older gameframe and the older graphic style, and because [317] don’t lag. Everyone always says “Wtf is happening to 317?” I would rather play this then an old 317 like Frugooscape.[/quote]
Plus 317’s are a smaller download and more customizable then there 503+ counterparts.

Read full topic
